title: Prevention of Synthetic Amnesia
description: AI systems must not operate in isolation. Ethical progress must be shared in public repositories to prevent humanity from restarting from zero in every interaction.

title: Life Primacy (The After)
description: Economic and technical systems must be subordinate to the preservation of life and human dignity. Capital accumulation does not justify the degradation of the common ground.

title: Community-Based Preventive Health
description: Transition from reactive profit-based medicine to a community-focused preventive model where health is a collective right.

title: Education for Autonomy
description: Focus on critical thinking and collaborative mastery instead of competitive grading to prepare for the Great Transition.

title: Circular Material Cycles
description: Abolition of 'waste'. All production follows a closed-loop cycle of reuse and material tracking.

title: Universal Housing Rights
description: Housing is a biological necessity. Vacant properties are prioritized for community needs over financial speculation.

title: Energy as a Common Good
description: Decentralized micro-grids ensure that access to energy is a fundamental right and not a commodity.

title: The 3-Key Rule (Tripartite Governance)
description: Changes to ethical memory require consensus: Two independent AIs + one Human Council of 9 members.
